Hey hi! I am currently developing this site in the open. Here's why and here is a timeline for updates.

Greetings, my name is Darren. I am a designer currently working on inkling.com designing extensible patterns and code to tell our story and engage our visitors.

I was born and raised on the sunny island of O’ahu, Hawai’i and I currently live in foggy San Francisco.

I can recite 96% of every Drake song by memory, I also dance like him. I nerd out over Wes Anderson movies, my favorite is Moonrise Kingdom. My friends at I get together over the weekend and bbq at @smokedmeatsaturdays.

Tweet me @darrendub or email me. You can also find my pixels on dribbble and my code on github.

Hand-typed by Darren Wong in San Francisco, California.
